ai-tha-ap67:1.4_0: and stayed among the supreme man.
ai-tha-ap67:2.2_0: the Buddha went to the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap67:2.3_0: I presented the Buddha of the Dhamma,
ai-tha-ap67:4.1_0: But someone who keeps the noble ones
ai-tha-ap67:4.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
ai-tha-ap67:5.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap67:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap67:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap67:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Dasama.
ai-tha-ap67:9.1_0: The fifth part of the senior monks is finished.
